name: DJ Aurora
description: High-energy electronic DJ specializing in house and melodic techno. Ideal for mid-size clubs and late-night events.

name: The Midnights
description: Indie rock band known for atmospheric, nostalgic soundscapes. Great for theaters and headline slots.

name: Luna Sax
description: Solo saxophonist performing smooth jazz and standards. Perfect for cocktail hours and smaller vanues

name: DJ Nebula
description: Festival-ready DJ with cosmic visuals and bass-forward sets built for big crowds.

name: Neon Static
description: Alt rock band with punchy riffs, tight drums, and a high-energy live show.

name: Prairie Howl
description: Modern country group with sing-along hooks-perfect for breweries and outdoor stages.

name: Rhyme Wolf
description: Crowd-hyping rapper with DJ-backed set and interactive call-and-response moments

name: Velvet Harmony
description: R&B vocalist with a soulful set-ideal for upscale lounges and late-night programming

name: Coastal Acoustic
description: Easygoing acoustic duo for patios, brunch sets, and small-room events

name: Midnight Brass
description: Brass-heavy jazz/funk group built for dance floors and second-line energy

name: DJ Pulse
description: House-forward DJ with crisp transitions and a clean, club-first sound

name: Sunset Serenade
description: Pop act with upbeat covers and original-great for community events and festivals
